Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Cactus Language offers over 20 languages taught in more than 120 locations all over the world. The languages offered include English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, and others. They offer general language courses for adults, professional courses for business purposes, language plus activity holidays, and summer language camps for children or teenagers.

Other popular destinations include China, Japan, England, France, the United States, Australia, South Korea, Italy, and Germany. The report analyzed data from 10 directories and provides regional breakdowns and destination preferences for specific types of travel activities.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: GV English offers General English, English for Academic Purposes, Business English, and English Exam Preparation courses in both Calgary and Victoria, Canada. They also offer Private English Lessons and Pathway programs. Test Centres for the Celpip and IELTS exams are available, along with services such as a Free English Level Check and Visa & Immigration assistance. Accommodations and activities are also provided.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Language International offers assistance in finding and booking language courses in various countries and cities around the world. They provide advice on choosing the right course and connect students directly to accredited language schools. They offer courses in 12 different languages and also offer a free 4-week online course with every booking in partnership with Babbel.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: According to the text, some of the top language schools in the world according to GoAbroad include Euroace in Spain, Maximo Nivel in Latin America, Greenheart Travel in France, EDUCA Language School in Russia, Qalam wa Lawh in Morocco, Hutong School in China, KCP International Japanese Language School in Japan, and Learn & Experience in the United Kingdom. The article emphasizes the importance of learning a second language and suggests that studying abroad in a country where the language is spoken is the best way to improve language skills. The text also provides information about the services and resources offered by GoAbroad.
